qualifiers.applicability: Applies if there is a predominant neighborhood pattern.

specs: Lots with garage in front half of the lot (F)
Lots with garage in the rear half of the lot (B & D)
Lots with no garage (E) [counts as a rear-pattern lot]

mandatory: Projects on this block must place the garage in the rear half of the lot if the rear-half pattern is predominant.
conditional_logic: If block is more than 600' long, consider only lots within 600' or the 10 lots closest to the subject lot.
If subject lot is a corner lot, consider the pattern on the street that the subject garage faces.

explicit_deviations: Exclude flag lots, multi-family use of 3+ units, and corner lots from the determination.

hierarchical: Determine predominant pattern category by dividing lots into front-half and rear-half pattern lots.
logical_dependencies: The contextual garage placement regulation applies if the rear-half pattern is predominant.
